description: LifecycleReporter domain allows reporting of lifecycle events.

commands.name: stopPreventingExit
commands.description: Does not prevent the process from exiting.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: If an Error instance, the error.name property

parameters.name: urls
parameters.description: Array of URLs associated with the error

parameters.name: lineColumns
parameters.description: Line, column pairs associated with the error. Already sourcemapped.

parameters.name: sourceLines
parameters.description: Source code preview associated with the error for up to 5 lines before the error, relative to the first non-internal stack frame.
